title: After My Older Brother Kicked Me Out of the Demon World, I Was Eaten by an Exorcist - Novel Updates
tags: Demons   Dense Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Naive Protagonist   Short Story   Yandere
author: 紫鶴
description:
I’m a demon! A NEET demon who lives off of his two outstanding brothers!

Then, one day, because I had been slacking off too much in my real job recently, my first brother forcibly sent me to the human world to make a contract with a human.

Anyway, I figured that if I stayed in the human world long enough, I'd be summoned sooner or later, but then my natural enemy, an exorcist, became a regular at my workplace and started to keep an eye on me. Moreover, this exorcist was one of the most powerful exorcists in this country. He'll definitely kill me if he finds out I'm a demon.

Why, just why did this happen… I was lamenting the fact that I couldn't return to the demon realm sooner, before one day, a summoning circle finally appeared right in front of me!

Wanting to leave this place as soon as possible, I jumped in without even checking the destination.

And what greeted me was the familiar face of a certain exorcist.

Then, I died.

My dearest older brother in the demon realm.

Please perform my resurrection ritual as soon as possible. Also, I swear that once I revive, I will never go back to the human world.

I have had enough of scary exorcists.>
